about.introSectionTitle: A Passion for Technology and Engineering
about.introParagraph1: Ever since I was a kid, I was fascinated by how things work. I used to take devices apart just to understand the logic behind each mechanism. That curiosity evolved into a clear calling: to build solutions that blend engineering, software, and creativity.
about.introParagraph2: Studying Mechatronics Engineering gave me a solid foundation in mechanical, electronic, and control systems. Over time, I developed a deep passion for software development and specialized as a Backend Developer, where I enjoy building the robust and efficient logic behind modern digital platforms.
about.journeyParagraph1: Throughout my career, I’ve worked on challenging projects ranging from industrial automation to complex web platforms. Each experience has sharpened my problem-solving skills and strengthened my ability to collaborate in multidisciplinary teams with a focus on quality and continuous improvement.
about.philosophyParagraph1: I believe in the transformative power of technology and the importance of lifelong learning. I approach every challenge with a mindset focused on clean, scalable solutions that bring real value. Efficiency, clarity, and a strong work ethic guide everything I do.
about.connectParagraph: Interested in what I do? Have a project or idea in mind? I’d love to hear from you. I’m always open to collaboration, learning, and building something meaningful together.
